nodes.bodyText: I will update this but wonder if it does make any sense to set the first version to a pre 1.0 release, shouldn’t we update all the first version to 1.0 once we release it ?

nodes.bodyText: Yes they should all be 1.0.0 when its GA. All older versions are EOL and dead. And those M2, RC2, RC3 versions dont add value but just more confusion.

nodes.bodyText: It is still practical to be able to tell (for a tweet and/or blog post) what's new in 1.0.0 compared to CR2 for the users who know/use CR2.

nodes.bodyText: So I'd vote for consistently using the CR3 label for the newest stuff until shortly before the release and eliminate all labels when releasing.
